thread.title: Rutgers vs. Ohio State live stream: TV, time, channel, how to watch online
thread.title_full: Rutgers vs. Ohio State live stream: TV, time, channel, how to watch online | NJ.com

author: Dan Duggan | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Rutgers vs. Ohio State live stream: TV, time, channel, how to watch online
text:
PISCATAWAY â€” All eyes in the college football world will be fixed on High Point Solutions Stadium on Saturday night when Rutgers hosts No. 1 Ohio State. The game will air nationally on ABC, which is the first Rutgers home game to be broadcast by the network.
ABC will send its top broadcast team to Piscataway with Chris Fowler and Kirk Herbstreit in the booth. Fowler has been on hand for some of Rutgers' biggest games , including the landmark win over No. 3 Louisville in 2006.
"There's a difference in perception of playing on Saturday night on ABC," Fowler said. "If they play well, it's an excellent showcase for the program. I think the atmosphere will be there, it will come through on TV and then it's up to the team to do the rest."
This is Rutgers' first game of the season on ABC. The Scarlet Knights have appeared on the Big Ten Network, ESPNU and ESPNews this season.
Here's everything you need to know about Saturday night's matchup:
When: Saturday, Oct. 24 at 8 p.m.
Where: High Point Solutions Stadium, Piscataway, N.J.
TV: ABC... Chris Fowler and Kirk Herbstreit will call the game, with Heather Cox working the sidelines
Radio: 970-WNYM; 1450-WCTC; 97.3-WENJ; 800-WTMR...Chris Carlin, Ray Lucas and Eric LeGrand will call the game, with Anthony Fucilli working the sidelines
Live stream: WatchESPN
Line: Ohio State -21
Here are five stories you need to read to get ready for the game:
1. Injured Rutgers receiver Leonte Carroo will be a game-time decision
2. Rutgers receiver Carlton Agudosi ready for his opportunity
3. Kyle Flood expects raucous atmosphere for Ohio State game
4. How has Rutgers quarterback Chris Laviano improved?
5. The five keys to the game for Rutgers
